name: textcontrast
title: Text Contrast for Dark Themes
description: Fixes low-contrast text when using system colors with a dark desktop theme.
author: Dmitri Kourennyi

preferences.name: allColors
preferences.title: Replace all colors
preferences.description: Replace all page colors, instead of only input-like elements. Only use if "Use system colors" option is set. Requires refresh of affected pages.
